# Implementation Plan

## User Stories

### US-001: First story (completed)

- [x] US-001: Add user login functionality

**As a** user
**I want** to login
**So that** I can access my account

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [x] Login form renders
- [x] Form validates input

### US-002: Second story (completed)

- [x] US-002: Add user registration

**As a** user
**I want** to register
**So that** I can create an account

#### Acceptance Criteria
- [x] Registration form renders
- [x] Form validates input
- [x] User is created in database
